Package org.eclipse.ant.core

Class Task

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.AntObject
org.eclipse.ant.core.Task
public class Task extends org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.AntObject
Represents an Ant task. Clients may instantiate this class; it is not intended to be subclassed.
Since:
2.1
Restriction:
This class is not intended to be subclassed by clients.
